thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 33 of 40
thread.title: Mark Hargrove

author: Mark Hargrove
title: Mark Hargrove
text:
You can buy pretty much anything from multiple places these days. Sometimes the thing you're buying is simple, well understood, and all you care about is the price. For purchases of complicated or unfamiliar items, though, shopping purely for the lowest price isn't the best choice -- the real determining factor (for me, anyway) is the site's pre- and post-sales support.
I'd have a lot of trouble identifying a site that does a better job of either than WholeLatteLove.com. Between their excellent video product reviews/demos, their superlative technical support wiki, and their responsive support staff I haven't worried for a minute about the super-automatic espresso machine I bought from them.
The *price* I paid was within a few dollars of the lowest price I found anywhere, but the *value* I got from buying from WLL was huge.
